title: test_login_user_authentication
description: Verify that the /api/auth/login endpoint successfully authenticates users with valid credentials and returns a JWT token, and rejects invalid credentials with a 401 status.

title: test_admin_login_with_optional_2fa
description: Verify that the /api/admin/auth/login endpoint authenticates admin users, enforces optional two-factor authentication, and returns a JWT token on success, or a 401 status on failure.

title: test_get_recruiter_profile
description: Verify that the /api/recruiter/profile GET endpoint returns the recruiter's profile data when the profile exists, and returns a 404 status when the profile is not found.

title: test_update_recruiter_profile
description: Verify that the /api/recruiter/profile PUT endpoint updates the recruiter's profile with valid data and returns a 200 status, and returns a 404 status if the profile does not exist.

title: test_track_view_endpoint
description: Verify that the /api/views/track POST endpoint records a new view for a profile or entity, respects rate limiting and uniqueness constraints, and returns a 200 status on success.

title: test_get_view_count_for_entity
description: Verify that the /api/views/:entity/:id GET endpoint returns the correct aggregated view count for the specified entity and id with a 200 status.

title: test_track_profile_view
description: Verify that the /api/profile/view POST endpoint tracks when a user views another user's profile, respects uniqueness and rate limiting, returns 200 on success, and handles errors with a 500 status.

title: test_get_unique_profile_viewer_count
description: Verify that the /api/profile/views/{userId} GET endpoint returns the unique viewer count for the specified userId with a 200 status, and handles errors with a 500 status.
